config.morph.cat.morph.name: Morph Ability
config.morph.cat.biomass.name: Biomass Ability
config.morph.cat.biomass.desc: Options for the biomass ability. These configs only have effect in DEFAULT mode, which has been disabled until said mode is finished.
config.morph.prop.morphTime.name: Morph Time
config.morph.prop.morphTime.desc: Time (in ticks) for a morph to complete.
config.morph.prop.aggressiveSizeRecalcul: Morph normally only recalculates size when it has to. This makes Morph recalculate the player size every tick whilst morphed.
config.morph.prop.supportedAttributes.de: Which attributes are supported by more, and how are values better. Format: <Resource Name of Attribute>;<more/less>. EG: "minecraft:generic.max_health;more".
config.morph.prop.disabledTraits.name: Disabled Traits
config.morph.prop.disabledTraits.desc: ID of traits you want to disable.
config.morph.prop.silentMorphs.name: Silent Morphs
config.morph.prop.silentMorphs.desc: Set the morph entity instance to silent, this disables ambient noise and any sound the morph makes.
config.morph.prop.biomassValue.name: Biomass Value
config.morph.prop.biomassValue.desc: How much of the entity volume is considered their mass.
config.morph.prop.biomassBypassAdvanceme: Enable the Biomass ability without requiring the advancement to unlock it?
config.morph.prop.disabledMobs.name: Disabled Mobs
config.morph.prop.disabledMobs.desc: Resource Location name for Mob types you cannot acquire biomass or morphs from.
config.morph.prop.morphMode.name: Morph Game Mode
config.morph.prop.morphMode.desc: The mode the mod runs in. Accepts CLASSIC, DISGUISE. DEFAULT has been disabled until it has been finished.
config.morph.prop.biomassSkinWhilstInvis: The Biomass Skin is meant to show during invisibility. Turning this off disables that.
config.morph.prop.selectorDistanceFromTo: The number of (scaled) pixels that the quick selector's selected option appears from the top of the screen.
config.morph.prop.selectorScale.name: Selector - Scale
config.morph.prop.selectorScale.desc: The scale of the selector (fractionally). Smaller numbers to scale down, larger numbers to scale up.
config.morph.prop.selectorAllowMouseCont: Allow control of the selector using the mouse. Also affects the radial menus.
config.morph.prop.radialScale.name: Radial Menu - Scale
config.morph.prop.radialScale.desc: The scale of the radial menu, in ratio to the size of the game.
config.morph.prop.acquisitionPlayAnimati: Plays the "acquisition" animation. 0 = Disable, 1 = Morph only, 2 = Biomass only, 3 = Biomass and Morph
config.morph.prop.acquisitionTendrilMaxC: The (approximate) maximum part count for a tendril. Also partially dictates the length (in ticks) of the animation. Higher = More parts, slower animation, Lower = Less parts, faster animation.
config.morph.prop.acquisitionTendrilPart: In first person, tendrils closer to you are partially opaque to reduce obscuring of your vision. Increase this number to keep tendrils partially transparent for longer distances.
config.morph.prop.morphAllowHandOverride: Enable overriding the hand render with a (compatible) morph hand? Disable if you have crashing issues/conflicts with other mods.
config.morph.prop.morphDisableRidingPlay: Disable Riding Players Renders in First Person
This disables rendering players that is riding the camera entity when in First Person.
config.morph.prop.biomassBarMode.name: Biomass Bar Mode
config.morph.prop.biomassBarMode.desc: How should we show the Biomass Bar? 0 = Disabled, 1 = When there's an update, 2 = Always
config.morph.prop.guiMinecraftStyle.name: Render GUI in Minecraft Style
config.morph.prop.guiMinecraftStyle.desc: Do we render the GUI in Minecraft Style (as opposed to Boxes & Stuff style)? 1 = Vanilla Style, 2 = Texture Pack Style
Reextract Mob Support Files from zip
command.morph.resources.error.extraction: An error occurred when extracting files. Check Java Console for more info.
command.morph.resources.error.playerNoNb: Players do not need NBT modifiers!
command.morph.morph.error.notLivingEntit: Entity supplied is not a LivingEntity type!
morph.gui.workspace.title: Biomass Menu
morph.gui.scene.biomassUpgrades.title: Upgrades
morph.gui.scene.biomassAbilities.title: Abilities
morph.gui.scene.morphs.title: Morphs
morph.gui.text.weight.tooltip: %1$s kg is %2$s lb for you imperial folk.
morph.gui.workspace.nbt.title: NBT Modifier Generator
morph.gui.workspace.nbt.help:
Generate an NBT Modifier for an existing entity.

Do your best to only keep NBT Keys that affect the appearance of the entity.

Hover over elements and the tooltips will help.

SHIFT-Click this button to open the export folder.
morph.gui.workspace.nbt.kept: This key is kept by this NBT modifier.
morph.gui.workspace.nbt.handledElsewhere: This key is modified by another NBT modifier.
morph.gui.workspace.nbt.stripped: This key is stripped from the morph.
morph.gui.workspace.nbt.keep.tooltip: Keep this NBT Key. Forcing a value also keeps this key (without this setting being enabled)
morph.gui.workspace.nbt.forceRemove.tool: Force remove this NBT Key. This overrides inherited Keep Modifiers
morph.gui.workspace.nbt.forceValue.toolt: Force a value for this NBT Key. Leaving it as empty will not change the NBT value.
morph.gui.workspace.nbt.modRequired.tool: Add a mod requirement (by mod id) for this modifier to work.
morph.gui.workspace.nbt.classRequired: You need to select a class level (For Class) to export to.
morph.gui.workspace.mobData.title: Mob Data Generator
morph.gui.workspace.mobData.help:
Generate Mob Data (biomass stats & traits) for a morph.

Hover over elements and the tooltips will help.

SHIFT-Click this button to open the export folder.
morph.advancement.unlock_biomass.title: A Mutation Complication
morph.advancement.unlock_biomass.descrip:
Rapid cellular death combined with rapid cellular regeneration increases the risk for random mutations.

Unlocks the ability to absorb Biomass.
morph.trait.traitFallNegate.name: Fall Negation
morph.trait.traitFloat.name: Float
morph.trait.traitHostile.name: Hostile
morph.trait.traitHostile.desc: Morph is marked as hostile and may not be targeted by mobs.
morph.trait.traitImmunityExplosive.name: Immunity - Explosives
morph.trait.traitImmunityFire.name: Immunity - Fire
morph.trait.traitImmunityMagic.name: Immunity - Magic
morph.trait.traitSink.name: Sink
morph.trait.traitSwimmer.name: Swimmer
morph.trait.traitSwimmer.desc: Morph has increased mobility in water.
morph.trait.traitWaterSensitivity.name: Water Sensitivity
morph.trait.traitUndead.name: Undead
morph.trait.traitUndead.desc: Mob is undead and will receive undead-related traits.
morph.trait.traitEffectResistance.name: Effect Resistance
morph.trait.traitEffectResistance.desc: Gain resistance to effect set in the trait.
morph.trait.traitEffectResistance.effect: The ID of the effect resistance. EG: minecraft:slowness.
morph.trait.traitImmunityDamageSource.de: Gain immunity to the damage source set in the trait.
morph.trait.traitImmunityDamageSource.da: The name of the damage type to be immune to. EG: outOfWorld
morph.trait.traitIntimidate.name: Intimidate
morph.trait.traitIntimidate.desc: Scares mobs of a certain type away from you (and prevents targeting).
morph.trait.traitIntimidate.idToIntimida: ID of the entity type to intimidate. Takes priority over Class to Intimidate.
morph.trait.traitIntimidate.classToIntim: Class name of the entity to intimidate.
The multiplier for the entity to run from you when intimidated (from far).
morph.trait.traitIntimidate.nearRunSpeed: The multiplier for the entity to run from you when intimidated (when near).
morph.trait.traitMoistSkin.name: Moist Skin
morph.trait.traitMoistSkin.desc: Mob must stay wet or will take dryness damage.
The max number of ticks the player can stay out of water before taking dryness damage.
morph.trait.traitStepHeight.name: Step Height
morph.trait.traitStepHeight.desc: Modifies the step height of the player.
morph.trait.traitStepHeight.amount.name: Amount
morph.trait.traitSunburn.name: Sunburn
morph.trait.traitSunburn.desc: Being out in daylight causes the mob to catch on fire.
morph.trait.traitSunburn.childrenAreImmu: Are child mobs of this entity immune to sunburn.
morph.trait.traitWaterBreather.name: Water Breather
morph.trait.abilityClimb.name: Climb
morph.trait.abilityEffectAttack.name: Effect Attack
morph.trait.abilityEffectAttack.effectId: The ID of the effect inflicted. EG: minecraft:slowness.
morph.trait.abilityEffectAttack.duration: Duration (in ticks) of the effect inflicted.
morph.trait.abilityFlight.name: Flight - Creative Style
morph.trait.abilityFlight.slowdownInWate: Will flying through water slow you down.
morph.trait.abilityFlightFlap.name: Flight - Flapping
morph.trait.abilityFlightFlap.desc: Can flap wings for flight aka infinite jump.
morph.trait.abilityFlightFlap.resetVerti: Resets vertical velocity when player hits Jump again.
morph.trait.abilityFlightFlap.velocityAd: How much vertical velocity to add when hitting Jump (can also be negative).
The limit of the number of flaps. Leave as null for infinite flaps.
morph.trait.abilityFlightFlap.slowdownIn: Will flying through water slow you down.
morph.trait.abilityRideable.name: Rideable
morph.trait.abilityRideable.desc: Can be ridden by other players.
morph.trait.abilityRideable.requiresSadd: If the entity implements IEquipable (MCP name), this makes Morph check if the entity is saddled.
morph.trait.abilitySlowFall.name: Slow Fall
morph.trait.abilitySlowFall.velocityMult: Multiply the vertical velocity (when falling) by this amount every tick. Can be more than 1.
morph.trait.abilitySlowFall.resetFallDis: Does this ability reset the fall distance.
